sense.def:
To believe that something is true
pomeni misliti, da je nekaj res.

seg.quote: It is believed that two prisoners have escaped.
I couldn't believe what I had heard.
I believed him to be right.

sense.def:
To believe someone
pomeni sprejeti, da je tisto, kar nam nekdo pripoveduje, resnično.

seg.quote: Don't believe a word he says.

sense.def:
To believe in something
pomeni, da smo o tistem prepričani — na primer, da obstaja Bog ali vile ali da se bo zgodil čudež.

To believe in something
pomeni, da smo za nekaj zagreti, ker smo prepričani, da je dobro ali prav.

seg.quote: He did not believe in educating women.
